# serval_tag (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "serval_tag" "example_tag" {
  id = "id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The ID of the tag.

### Read-Only

- `color` (String) (OPTIONAL) The color of the tag (CSS color string).
- `icon_slug` (String) (OPTIONAL) The icon slug for the tag.
- `name` (String) The name of the tag.
